keyword: how many calories in a sausage link
title: How Many Calories in a Sausage Link?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a sausage link, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sausage Link?
assumptions: Standard pork breakfast sausage link, cooked (pan-fried), ~28 g, no added seasonings or fillers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, meat type (pork, beef, turkey), size, cooking method, and additives. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical cooked pork sausage link contains about 85 kcal and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a sausage link?
faqs.a: About 85 kcal for a standard cooked pork sausage link.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one sausage link?
Do sausage links have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 7 g total fat, including 2.5 g saturated fat per link.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in sausage?
faqs.a: Frying adds oil (more calories); baking or grilling keeps it lower.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie sausage link options?
faqs.a: Turkey or chicken links have fewer calories, around 60 kcal per link.
